title: Anyone for hinting? Paid job
content:
I am looking for professional one for hinting web font. (Paid job) Anyone around ??

Thanks
author: ott

comments.content: You're looking for a professional's opinion on a type of webfont? Specifics are needed. Type of job, client's industry, etc... but at this point, I'm guessing you either figured it out or you lost a client...
